long_description: Filled with Marmot's own mid-loft polyester insulation, the Calen jacket for women offers an excellent warmth-to-weight ratio for mountaineering and other backcountry adventures. Nylon ripstop shell quilted with Thermal R polyester insulation. Angel-Wing Movement(TM) frees up your arm mobility. Elastic-bound cuffs and a standup collar on the Marmot Calen jacket seal in warmth. Brushed tricot collar lining adds comfort. Zippered hand pockets and chest pocket; inside zippered pocket.
short_description: Filled with Marmot's own mid-loft polyester insulation, the Calen jacket for women offers an excellent warmth-to-weight ratio for mountaineering and other backcountry adventures.
